TopicTitle: Hello... again I guess ? Server Rollback Style !

Articles.Content:
Well. I apparently created my first account in an odd period. Forum was soon inaccessible ! After a few weeks of intense conversation with kerbalnautes, forum crashes, wiki crashes etc...

KSP server was down, I was sad.

Then I thought it was time for me to come back on this wounderful place.

"Hugh ? Wrong password ? Again ? Again ? Again ? Is my name spelled correctly ? Yep... So... What ?"

*Requesting new password

"Account does not exist ? Well, this email I got right under my eyes says otherwise... OH, WAIT I REMEMBER. Server crashed. Rollback ?"

HELLO (again) GUYz !

Welcome (back) to the forums!

Yeah, the server crash back in April certainly caused quite a few headaches. I had to recreate my account myself!

Happy landings!
